Function.DocText: Base_Var_File_Loop_To_Create : use this var to set the loop file to create Base_Var_File_Loop_Size_To_Create : Use this var to set the size of the lopp file to create Base usage : Base_Var_File_Loop_To_Create="My_device_file" ( full path ) Base_Var_File_Loop_Size_To_Create="My_size" (for 100 mo = 100 autodoc.sh create_objname.sh install_base.sh readme.md script_template.sh 1000 = 100000 ) Device_loop_Create
